overview_of_class: This class will introduce you to the art and skill of color timing, AKA color correction. You will learn the fundamentals in primary, secondary, and effects color correction, as well as stabilizing and tracking. This proficiency will include getting a handle on the complex post-production workflow involving DaVinci Resolve and Avid and Premiere roundtrips, including how to use Quicktime and Raw formats such as RED, Black Magic and Canon Raw. While the focus of the class will be on DaVinci Resolve, we will also explore the new color grading capabilities in Adobe Premiere. The class will be a challenging mixture of artistic and technical, with a deeply hands-on approach.
name: Topics in Post-Production
title: SoC RTVF 378-0-20 Topics in Post-Production
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-req: Students must be RTVF Majors and have taken and passed RTVF 190 with a C- or better to register for this course.
